name: (S)-limonene,[reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase]:oxygen oxidoreductase (3-hydroxylating)
definition: (-)-Limonene + [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + Oxygen <=> (-)-trans-Isopiperitenol + [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + H2O
